acceptedBid(bid) - Method in class ca.ualberta.taskr.ViewTaskActivity
Implemented method for stub in interface of class AcceptBidFragment. If Task' status is not DONE or ASSIGNED, updates both Task's chosen bidder to selected Bid's owner and Task's status to ASSIGNED before updating Task in ElasticSearch index. Task is then updated on server.

addBid(newBid) - Method in class ca.ualberta.taskr.models.Task
add a class Bid to the task
addBidOrMarkDone(view) - Method in class ca.ualberta.taskr.ViewTaskActivity
This method will either set the displayed Task's status to DONE if user is its Requester or allow user to add a bid to the Task otherwise using class EditBidFragment. If the user is a Requester trying to mark the task done, the task status will be changed iff the task is currently ASSIGNED. Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown. If the user is a provider trying to add a bid, the class EditBidFragment will be opened iff the task is open for bids (i.e. status is REQUESTED or BID). Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown.

CachingRetrofit class. This class is responsible for fetching cached data and locally mocking Retrofit calls instead of trying to grab results via elasticsearch

CachingRetrofit.getServerInfo - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch
Return the server status of the server. A local cached copy will be returned if the network is unavailable and an updated copy will be returned if the network is available
CachingRetrofit.getTasks - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch
Return a List of class Task objects from either a cached source or via elasticsearch, depending on if the network is available. If there are is any cached information that is not on the server this information will be attempted to be uploaded
CachingRetrofit.getUsers - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch
Return a List of class User objects from either a cached source or via elasticsearch, depending on if the network is available. If there are is any cached information that is not on the server this information will be attempted to be uploaded
CachingRetrofit.updateTask - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch
Attempt to update a task. If the task was succesfully updated, attempt to upload any other cached data to the elasticsearch server
CachingRetrofit.updateUser - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch

TaskStatus - Enum in ca.ualberta.taskr.models
TaskStatus Enumeration. Shows the various states that a task might be in -REQUESTED: The task has been requested, but nobody has bid on it yet -BID: The task has been bid on -ASSIGNED: The task has been assigned to a bidder -DONE: The task has been completed by a bidder

UpdateUser(user) - Method in class ca.ualberta.taskr.EditUserActivity
Update the current user's information on the server using async network calls. If new user, the new class User object to the server. If successful, current username and class User object are stored to shared preferences. If existing user, update class User object on server and the user info is similarly saved to shared preferences. Otherwise, updated class User object is stored locally until server connectivity is established.

V

ViewTaskActivity - Class in ca.ualberta.taskr
Displays all information for a selected task including title, location, and bids. Task Requesters can change the Task's status by either reopening or marking as done an assigned task. Requesters can also accept/decline bids. Task Providers can place bids with an inputted monetary amount.
ViewTaskActivity() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.taskr.ViewTaskActivity
Displays all information for a selected task including title, location, and bids. Task Requesters can change the Task's status by either reopening or marking as done an assigned task. Requesters can also accept/decline bids. Task Providers can place bids with an inputted monetary amount.
